items.value:
The actual student that you are playing.
* Is a cylnder
* But it's probably not a cylinder in-game

That other student that everyone believes that this is the actual model...
* Has stats from Classic
* <size=60%>Not suitable for Plus because of intended "Classic Remastered" gameplay...</size>

The student that replaced Default in Baldi's Basics Times
* Stats are the same as Default 
* But slots are the same as Predicted Fanon

Corrupted data, but it's still playable for some reason...

Ability: Glitched Objects
Allows the player to throw random objects towards their enemies.

Loves spreading party cheer!
However, the school thinks you're disrupting the entire class...

Ability is undecided

He's likely not like It's a Bully, but he can cause alot of mischief!

P. Ability is undecided

This intelligent robot thinks way further into math, sadly the math machines only contains basic math.<size=60%>

P. Ability: Intelligent Math Thinking
Gives the player the directions to the correct math machine answer by just looking at the machine itself for a few seconds.

P. Ability: The Think Power
You'll gain 50 YTPs on the start of the gameplay, YTPs will slowly decrease during spoop mode, reaching to zero will result an unexpected vision change.

This student carries so much items where all of the weight decided to slow him down!

P. Ability: Heavypacker
Adds 8 more slots, which equals 16 slots in total! But carrying too much items would result slowing down your hiking.

The inventor of inventions, she builds new inventions with her trusty wrench!

Ability: Engineering
Allows the player to construct some obstacles, but make sure that you have those tinkerneering items with you!

This creature wants to pass the test! But can you help him pass the test?

P. Ability: Passing Grade
Allows the player to not get blinded by The Test and Math Machines gives out extra YTPs! On the other hand, getting a math machine wrong will increase the NPC timescale.
He just wants to beat Hide and Seek for fun, Principal of the Thing considers this as "running in the halls" due to him breaking one of the school rules!

Tinkerneering Wrench
This wrench is the pathway to creating new inventions,
although you'll need some education to use this!

Backpack
Allows you to carry more items up to double your max item slots!
But the more items you'll carry, the more weight you're putting yourself into!
